mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mencken quote, notes; 01 of 01
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 113-275, Scrapbook of Faulds Fingerprint Notes (includes publication and manuscript items.)Page 47; no title; Handwritten notes quoting H. L. Mencken about a man's struggle with problems not in seeking recognition but as reward for his industry. Comparable to the struggle Faulds endured with the fingerprints.; 1 leaf; DF 871
